001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.stream.Collectors;
024import java.util.stream.Stream;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027
028/**
029 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
030 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>
031 * function.
032 */
033public final class MapFind {
034  private static final String NAME = "find";
035  @NonNull
036  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
037      .name(NAME)
038      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
039      .deterministic()
040      .contextIndependent()
041      .focusIndependent()
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("input")
044          .type(IItem.type())
045          .zeroOrMore()
046          .build())
047      .argument(IArgument.builder()
048          .name("key")
049          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
050          .one()
051          .build())
052      .returnType(IArrayItem.type())
053      .returnOne()
054      .functionHandler(MapFind::execute)
055      .build();
056
057  private MapFind() {
058    // disable construction
059  }
060
061  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
062  @NonNull
063  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
064      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
065      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
066      IItem focus) {
067    ISequence<?> input = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
068    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
069
070    return ISequence.of(IArrayItem.ofCollection(
071        ObjectUtils.notNull(find((Collection<? extends IItem>) input, key)
072            .collect(Collectors.toList()))));
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
077   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
078   *
079   * @param items
080   *          the item sequence to search for key matches
081   * @param key
082   *          the key for the item to retrieve
083   * @return the retrieved item
084   */
085  @NonNull
086  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
087      @NonNull Collection<? extends IItem> items,
088      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
089    return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()
090        // handle item
091        .flatMap(item -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(item), key)));
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
096   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
097   *
098   * @param item
099   *          the item to search for key matches
100   * @param key
101   *          the key for the item to retrieve
102   * @return the retrieved item
103   */
104  @NonNull
105  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
106      @NonNull IItem item,
107      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
108    Stream<ICollectionValue> retval;
109    if (item instanceof IArrayItem) {
110      IArrayItem<?> array = (IArrayItem<?>) item;
111      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(array.stream()
112          // handle array values
113          .flatMap(value -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(value), key)));
114    } else if (item instanceof IMapItem) {
115      IMapItem<?> map = (IMapItem<?>) item;
116      // handle map
117      retval = find(map, key);
118    } else {
119      // do nothing
120      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.empty());
121    }
122    return retval;
123  }
124
125  @NonNull
126  private static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
127      @NonNull ICollectionValue value,
128      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
129    Stream<ICollectionValue> retval;
130    if (value instanceof ISequence) {
131      ISequence<?> sequence = (ISequence<?>) value;
132      // handle sequence items
133      retval = find((Collection<? extends IItem>) sequence, key);
134    } else {
135      // handle item
136      retval = find((IItem) value, key);
137    }
138    return retval;
139  }
140
141  /**
142   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
143   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
144   * <p>
145   * This is a specialized method for processing an item that is a map item, which
146   * can be searched for a key in a much more efficient way.
147   *
148   * @param item
149   *          the item to search for key matches
150   * @param key
151   *          the key for the item to retrieve
152   * @return the retrieved item
153   */
154  @NonNull
155  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
156      @NonNull IMapItem<?> item,
157      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
158    return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(
159        // add matching value, if it exists
160        Stream.ofNullable(MapGet.get(item, key)),
161        item.values().stream()
162            // handle map values
163            .flatMap(value -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(value), key))));
164  }
165}
